title: Personal Teacher with Accommodation
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Happy New Year. Thanks for reading my post. This is somewhat unusual so please read till the end, and only reply if you really fit what I'm looking for.

I'm a successful executive with an otherwise happy domestic life. I am looking for an attractive, easygoing, kind female to help me practice and improve my manly skills.

This is an assignment of 3-6 months. You should be non-attached, open minded and flexible. I will provide you with a beautiful one bedroom flat with exclusive use. In addition I will give living expenses plus. In exchange I expect 2-3 hours per week of hands on training / practice, and some additional time just hanging out in the flat.

If you think you are up to this challenge then please respond with some details about yourself and why you think you suit this position.
